pages.text: The $(item)Seer's Sigil$() is a more advanced form of the Divination Sigil.$(br2)While retaining the ability to display the amount of $(blood)LP$() stored in the bound player's Soul Network, it also shows additional information when looking at a Blood Altar.

From top to bottom:$(li)The current tier of the Blood Altar$(li)The current amount and maximum capacity of $(blood)Life Essence$() in the altar$(li)The current crafting progress$(li)The $(blood)LP$() consumption per tick the Altar will use when crafting$(li)The current $(blood)LP$() storage of any Charging Runes
The $(item)Seer's Sigil$() Blood Altar information HUD.
